definitions.definition: Any salt of dichromic acid ; in solution the orange dichromate anion.(Cr 2 O 7 ) is in equilibrium with the yellow chromate anion (CrO 4 ), the relative amount of each ion depending on the pH ; they are both very powerful oxidizing agents

main_definition: ( chemistry ) Any salt of dichromic acid ; in solution the orange dichromate anion.(Cr 2 O 7 ) is in equilibrium with the yellow chromate anion (CrO 4 ), the relative amount of each ion depending on the pH ; they are both very powerful oxidizing agents
